subject: Running
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt helped the Jamaican men win the 4x100-meter relay at the world championships, while the United States women were unable to advance past the preliminary round because of an injury.
snippet: Usain Bolt helped the Jamaican men win the 4x100-meter relay at the world championships, while the United States women were unable to advance past the preliminary round because of an injury.
